name: Quick And Angry
description:
Quick And Angry is a low poly racing game designed to challenge the player to find the best way to get through the Race! You will have to learn the courses, and where / how to make the winning pass. 

Being a development build currently, there are some glitches that will be worked out. Features new and coming in the future are found in the New Stuff section of the game. I am always open to feedback, and suggestions.

I hope you enjoy playing this game, even if it makes you a little bit mad at first. 

-Will
